feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for New Zealand issued by MetService
feed.rights: Copyright Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited, 2026. Licensed under Creative Commons BY 4.0.

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 120 to 150 mm of rain in parts of the area. Peaks rates of 25 to 40 mm/h likely in localised downpours, with thunderstorms also possible. Rain easing from the west Friday morning. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain, with thunderstorms and localised downpours possible. Rainfall amounts may approach warning criteria or possibly exceed them in localised areas. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 60 to 90 mm of rain on top what has already fallen. Peak rates of 25 to 40 mm/h possible in thunderstorms and localised downpours Thursday morning and afternoon. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain and rainfall amounts may approach warning criteria. Thunderstorms and localised downpours possible. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Low. Changes: The chance of upgrade for this Watch has been decreased to Low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited
